briefTitle: A Study of Gefapixant (MK-7264) in Adult Participants With Chronic Cough (MK-7264-030)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, 12-Month Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of MK-7264 in Adult Participants With Chronic Cough (PN030)
summary: The primary objectives of this study are to evaluate the efficacy of gefapixant (MK-7264) in reducing cough frequency as measured over a 24-hour period, and to determine the safety and tolerability of gefapixant. The primary hypothesis is that at least one dose of gefapixant is superior to placebo in reducing coughs per hour (over 24 hours) at Week 24.

primaryOutcome.measure: Model-Based Geometric Mean Ratio (GMR) of 24-Hour Coughs Per Hour at Week 24/Baseline
